actions.text: Ordered to be Reported.
Reported by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 101-741.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 465.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
The chair announced that a second on the motion to suspend the rules is not required.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 101-419.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to convey certain Oregon and California Railroad Grant Lands in Josephine County, Oregon to the Rogue Community College District, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Josephine County, Oregon, to the Rogue Community College District. Reserves mineral rights to the United States. Provides for reversion of such land to the United States if it is used for other than educational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to convey certain Oregon and California Railroad Grant Lands in Josephine County, Oregon to the Rogue Community College District, and for other purposes.
